java.net.http.HttpRequest;&#10;import java.net.http.HttpResponse;&#10;import java.io.IOException;&#10;import java.util.Scanner;&#10;&#10;public class ApiClient {&#10;&#10;    // Base URL for the API&#10;    private static final String BASE_API_URL = "https://reverse.mubi.tech/v1";&#10;&#10;    public static void main(String[] args) {&#10;        // Create a Scanner object to read user input&#10;        Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);&#10;&#10;        // Prompt the user for the API endpoint&#10;        System.out.print("Enter the API endpoint (e.g., /example-endpoint): ");&#10;        String endpoint = scanner.nextLine();&#10;&#10;        // Close the scanner&#10;        scanner.close();&#10;&#10;        // Fetch and print the API response based on user input&#10;        try {&#10;            String response = getApiResponse(endpoint);&#10;            System.out.println("Response: " + response);&#10;        } catch (IOException | InterruptedException e) {&#10;            System.err.println("Request failed: " + e.getMessage());&#10;            e.printStackTrace();&#10;        }&#10;    }&#10;&#10;    public static String getApiResponse(String endpoint) throws IOException, InterruptedException {&#10;        // Construct the full URL with the endpoint&#10;        String apiUrl = BASE_API_URL + endpoint;&#10;&#10;        // Initialize the HTTP client&#10;        HttpClient client = HttpClient.newHttpClient();&#10;&#10;        // Create a request to the API&#10;        HttpRequest request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()&#10;            .uri(URI.create(apiUrl))&#10;            .header("Content-Type", "application/json") // Set headers if needed&#10;            .GET() // Use GET method&#10;            .build();&#10;&#10;        // Send the request and handle the response&#10;        HttpResponse<String> response = client.send(request, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());&#10;&#10;        // Return the response body&#10;        return response.body();&#10;    }&#10;}&#10;</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block
